SceneDescription.name: Endgame
SceneDescription.description:
Lord Borkus is sitting at his desk when you walk in.
Lord Borkus: "It goes without saying that I am very displeased, Assassin."
Assassin: [No shit…]
Assassin: [How the hell do I get out of this…?]
Assassin: [I’ll just tell him what actually happened. That’ll at least direct some of the fire away from me]
